title: Quickex Exchange
author: Quickex Exchange
created_time: April 19, 2023, 10:15:08 PMLast edit: April 24, 2023, 10:03:31 PM by Quickex Exchange
content: 🌟 Quickex | The Ultimate One-Tap Crypto Exchange Experience🌟Quickex is here to transform the way you trade cryptocurrencies, offering a one-tap exchange service with the best rates and an easy-to-use interface. Get ready for a seamless trading experience on  Quickex! At Quickex, we pride ourselves on simplifying the process of finding the best exchange rates for your trades. Our platform connects to numerous reputable exchanges like Bittrex, HitBTC, Exmo, Okex, Binance, Kraken, Coinbase Pro, Bitstamp, and more, ensuring a seamless and efficient trading experience for our users.🔥 Quickex Features 🔥🚀 Best rates: Aggregated from 20+ crypto exchanges, ensuring you always get the best deals.💡 One-tap service: A user-friendly platform that allows you to exchange crypto effortlessly, with no registration required.🔒 Privacy-focused: No KYC or email needed, giving you peace of mind while trading.💳 Buy crypto with a credit card: Get your desired crypto within 5-30 minutes.💰 Low fees: A flat 0.5% fee on transactions, with no hidden charges.🤝 50% affiliate program: Earn big by referring friends to Quickex.🌐 Growing exchange pairs: Our list of available pairs is constantly expanding.🌟 24/7 support: Get assistance whenever you need it, day or night.Why Choose Quickex?ㅤ🔎 Real-time rate comparisons: Our extensive network of exchanges allows us to provide real-time rate comparisons and offer you the most competitive prices available.💰 Best value for your crypto transactions: Save time and guarantee that you are always getting the best value for your trades.🌐 Expanding list of supported exchanges: Our team is constantly working to expand our list of supported exchanges, providing even more options and flexibility for our users.🔝 Staying up-to-date: We are dedicated to staying current with the latest market trends and developments, ensuring that we continue to deliver the most comprehensive and user-friendly trading platform in the industry.🌟 Introducing the Quickex Affiliate Program 🌟Join our lucrative affiliate program and start earning passive income today! By referring new users to Quickex, you'll receive a generous 50% share of our revenue on each referral.Affiliate Program Benefits:ㅤ📈 High earning potential: Earn 50% of our revenue on each referral🍪 Unlimited cookie lifetime: Benefit from long-lasting tracking and higher conversion rates🔥 100% acceptance percentage: Everyone is welcome to join and start earning💸 Fast payouts: Receive your first payout after just 3 unique transactions made by 3 different users to 3 different wallets🪙 Low minimum payout: Only 0.0001 BTC is required to cash out your earnings🔗 Stay Connected 🔗Stay up-to-date with the latest news and updates by following us on our social media channels:📱 Telegram:  QuickEx Telegram 📘 Twitter:  QuickEx Twitter🌟 Bestchange:  Bestchange.com  (Read this post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5449509.msg62143854#msg62143854)🤞Trustpilot :  Quickex is rated "Excellent" with 4.8 / 5 on Trustpilot ㅤ🎯 Start Trading with Quickex Today! 🎯Join the revolution in crypto exchange platforms and start trading with Quickex at https://quickex.io/ Save money on fees and enjoy the best rates![/list][/list]

comments.author: Quickex Exchange
comments.created_time: April 19, 2023, 10:25:37 PMLast edit: May 22, 2023, 12:10:32 AM by Quickex Exchange
comments.body: 🎉 Quickex USDT Giveaway: Share Your Experience & Win! 🎉Quickex is excited to announce an amazing giveaway for our Bitcointalk community! Share your Quickex experience on this thread, and you could win incredible USDT prizes! We're looking for the most exciting and genuine reviews. Don't miss this opportunity to share your thoughts and grab some extra crypto!🏆 Prizes:🥇 1st place:  80 USDT🥈 2nd place: 50 USDT🥉 3rd place: 20 USDTHow to Enter:1. Share your Quickex experience as a reply to this thread2. Make sure to include your Bitcointalk username in your postDeadline:All reviews will be accepted till 31th of May.Winners will be chosen based on the quality and authenticity of their reviews. Hurry up and participate in this amazing giveaway! Good luck, and we can't wait to read your reviews!Note: Please ensure your posts follow Bitcointalk's rules and guidelines. Inappropriate or spammy posts will be disqualified.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Quickex Exchange on April 19, 2023, 10:25:37 PMHow to Enter:    1. Share your Quickex experience as a reply to this thread    2. Make sure to include your Bitcointalk username in your postWhen does the competition for the giveaway end? I have tried to find out and have not seen any timeframe for the competition. So, I hope you will give a timeframe for the competition. Also, you may run a review writing campaign while all the users who will be accepted by you will write the review positive/negative/analytical will receive the payment.

comments.author: Quickex Exchange

Share your Quickex experience as a reply to this thread    2. Make sure to include your Bitcointalk username in your postWhen does the competition for the giveaway end? Also, you may run a review writing campaign while all the users who will be accepted by you will write the review positive/negative/analytical will receive the payment.Thanks so much for your comment! 😊 We've made a note of your suggestion regarding the giveaway deadline, and edited our fault. Right now, we're trying to get better acquainted with the Bitcointalk community and understand its audience, so we can plan even more amazing giveaways in the future.For the time being, we'll stick to our current giveaway, but we promise that we'll be hosting even bigger and more exciting events soon! We truly appreciate your feedback and are grateful for your suggestion.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.created_time: April 19, 2023, 10:44:26 PMLast edit: April 23, 2023, 12:23:26 PM by GxSTxV
comments.body: Unfortunately i wanted to participate on reviewing your exchanger today and swap some of my USDT coins to Bitcoin but i found out that the minimum amount allowed is significantly higher than what i expected which is 0.1 BTC as a minimum, in my opinion users wouldn’t jump straight into an exchanger before trying with a low amount of money to make sure everything goes well before using a higher amount. And like this i don’t see a point of using Quickex if i easily can use Other swap with lower minimums.This is actually a good giveaway, your exchanger has already a great amount of positive reviews on Bestchange, i would love to give it a try and participate if only your minimum allowed amount to trade is not that high.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Quickex Exchange on April 19, 2023, 10:25:37 PM    All reviews will be accepted till 1th of March.It is great that you have set a deadline for review. But I could not understand why you have set it for about a year. I doubt it is a mistake otherwise it can't be this type of deadline for a review competition. Please have a look at it and re-consider the deadline for the review.

comments.author: Quickex Exchange
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on April 20, 2023, 02:04:48 AMQuote from: Quickex Exchange on April 19, 2023, 10:25:37 PM    All reviews will be accepted till 1th of March.It is great that you have set a deadline for review. Please have a look at it and re-consider the deadline for the review.Thank you for your observation, and you are absolutely correct. We have adjusted our deadlines to a more accurate date.

comments.author: Quickex Exchange
comments.body: Quickex.io is on Trustpilot - Share your feedback and check out our reviews! Hello Bitcointalk community,We are excited to announce that Quickex.io has been added to Trustpilot for a while! As part of our ongoing commitment to transparency and customer satisfaction, we want to make it easy for our users to share their experiences and read reviews from others who have used our platform.Please visit our Trustpilot page at  Quickex is rated "Excellent" with 4.8 / 5 on Trustpilot  to see the feedback we have received so far, and feel free to leave your own review if you have used our services. Your honest feedback is invaluable to us, as it helps us improve our platform and services, and allows potential customers to make an informed decision when choosing a cryptocurrency exchange.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Better than other 1000 exchange platforms meanwhile one I use that's simpleswap has significantly more coins support, and I get better and faster customer support there. For now I see no reason to switch to quickex. Give users reasons to switch to you! Good luck

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: i just visit your website and try to exchange but I have a few questions 1. How did you calculate the withdrawal fee on your website?  because I try USDT(ERC20) to BTC the withdrawal fee is 0.0004 BTC if I reverse it the withdrawal fee is 25.6 USDT2. I want to try and review your website but sadly the minimum exchange is too high. It's over 2.8k$ minimum to exchange which is too high.

comments.author: Quickex Exchange
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on April 21, 2023, 03:55:07 AMBetter than other 1000 exchange platforms meanwhile one I use that's simpleswap has significantly more coins support, and I get better and faster customer support there. For now I see no reason to switch to quickex. Give users reasons to switch to you! Good luck Hello! We appreciate your loyalty to SimpleSwap and understand why you enjoy their services. However, at QuickEx, we continually strive to improve our platform and provide unique benefits that make us an appealing choice for users.Here are a few reasons why you might want to consider switching to QuickEx:1. Competitive Rates: We monitor the market closely and consistently offer the best rates possible. Our advanced algorithms ensure that you receive optimal value for every trade you make on our platform.2. Instant Exchanges: QuickEx's innovative technology allows for near-instant exchanges, ensuring that your trades are executed swiftly and efficiently.3. User-friendly Interface: Our platform is designed with user experience in mind. We have made it easy to navigate and understand, whether you're a seasoned trader or a beginner.4. Advanced Security: Security is our top priority. QuickEx employs state-of-the-art encryption and robust security measures to protect your funds and personal information.5. 24/7 Customer Support: Our dedicated customer support team is available around the clock to assist you with any questions or concerns. We pride ourselves on our responsiveness and the ability to resolve issues promptly.6. Continuous Improvement: At QuickEx, we never stop innovating. We are always working on adding new features and improving our platform to provide the best possible experience for our users.We understand that making a switch can be challenging, but we invite you to give QuickEx a try and experience the advantages we offer. Thank you for your well wishes and we hope to welcome you to the QuickEx community soon!

comments.author: ardong
comments.body: Hello, i have a few questions before testing the exchange. 1. Are there any additional fees apart from the flat 0.5% fee on transactions?2. Can you explain the one-tap service feature in more detail?Thank in advance

comments.author: Quickex Exchange
comments.body: Quote from: ardong on April 22, 2023, 09:04:06 PMHello, i have a few questions before testing the exchange. 1. Are there any additional fees apart from the flat 0.5% fee on transactions?2. Can you explain the one-tap service feature in more detail?Thank in advance1. Regarding fees on QuickEx, the platform primarily charges a flat 0.5% fee on transactions as you mentioned. Additional fees, if any, could be related to the network fees for deposits and withdrawals. These fees are generally determined by the blockchain network of the specific cryptocurrency you are dealing with and are not controlled by QuickEx. It's essential to check the platform's latest fee structure for any updates or additional fees that might apply.

comments.author: Quickex Exchange
comments.body: Quote from: ardong on April 22, 2023, 09:04:06 PMHello, i have a few questions before testing the exchange. 1. Are there any additional fees apart from the flat 0.5% fee on transactions?2. Can you explain the one-tap service feature in more detail?Thank in advance2. The "one-tap service" feature in QuickEx is designed to make exchanging cryptocurrencies easy and fast for users. With this feature, users can quickly swap one cryptocurrency for another with a simple tap or click. You don't need to go through complex trading pairs or worry about order books and market depth. The one-tap service simplifies the process by allowing users to choose the cryptocurrencies they want to exchange, input the desired amount, and complete the transaction with a single action. QuickEx takes care of the rest, finding the best available rate and completing the exchange for you.

It's reasonable for users to want to test an exchange with a smaller amount of funds before committing to larger transactions.We are undoubtedly contemplating the possibility of facilitating trades with smaller amounts for our users.

comments.author: Quickex Exchange
comments.body: Dear QuickEx community members, we would like to inform you that we are currently facing some issues with our listing on BestChange. As a result, QuickEx has been temporarily excluded from the platform. URL: https://www.bestchange.com/quickex-exchanger.htmlOur team is actively investigating the situation and working diligently to resolve it as soon as possible. We understand the importance of maintaining our presence on BestChange and are committed to providing a seamless experience for our users.Once the issue is resolved, we will share a proper notification to keep our community informed. We appreciate your understanding and patience during this time. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to our support team.Thank you for your continued support, and we look forward to serving you better.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Quickex Exchange on April 24, 2023, 09:11:12 PMWe understand your concerns regarding the minimum exchange amount on QuickEx. It's reasonable for users to want to test an exchange with a smaller amount of funds before committing to larger transactions.We are undoubtedly contemplating the possibility of facilitating trades with smaller amounts for our users.Why 0.1 BTC, seriously?This is 2023, where 1 BTC is almost $30k not back in the day when BTC was just $1k, How many people do you think are going to sacrifice almost $3k as a minimum on a platform they barely know about?Even old reputable platforms don't have such a very high minimum limit.

That response ain't mine either, it was automatically there. Hello there! Thank you for your feedback. We're always looking to improve our platform, and your input is precious. We understand your concerns about the minimum amount required for certain coins, and we're actively working on addressing this issue to provide a more inclusive trading experience.Regarding the comparison with other platforms, we appreciate your positive comments on our rates. At QuickEx, we strive to offer the best possible rates for our users.As for the chat issue, we apologize for any confusion caused by the automatic Russian response. We're looking into this issue to ensure our chat support is available in the appropriate language for our users. If you have any further concerns or suggestions, please share your thoughts =)
